title: Whereas His Majesty hath been graciously pleased to grant a warrant under his royal sign manual, to prepare a bill to pass under the great seal of England, containing a grant or demise of all His Majesties revenue in this his kingdom of Ireland ... by the Lords Justices and Council of Ireland, Mich. Dublin, c., Art. Granard.
author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,
